text: (Phira'auna) mhanala, majhi paravanagi ghenyapurvica tumhi tyacyavara imana rakhale, niscitaca ha tumaca saradara (motha guru) ahe, jyane tumha sarvanna jadu sikavali ahe. Tevha tumhala attaca mahita padela. Sapatha ahe. Mi dekhila tumace hata paya virud'dha disanni kapuna takina ani tumha sarvanna phasavara latakavina
